summary: THE VEHICLE CONTINUED TO EXPERIENCE PROBLEM WITH THE ABS AFTER THE VEHICLE WAS SERVICED FOR  NHTSA RECALL #02I002000ON. THE DEALER STATED THAT THERE WAS NOTHING THEY COULD DO AND THAT THEY REPLACED THE COMPONENT INDICATED IN THE RECALL.   *NM   *NM
